InitializeD3D
void CRenderer::InitializeD3D(
HWND hwnd
)

Initializes the server side renderer. Clients should call this method indirectly (via IRenderer::Setup) at application startup.  Parameters: hwnd - HWND to use for drawing

ID3DBlob **ppBlob

Loads the shader into a blob from the specified file.

Parameters

std::wstring&

Name of file to load from

ID3DBlob**

Returns the created shader blob

LoadShaderInfo
void CRenderer::LoadShaderInfo(
std::wstring &filename,
IShaderInfo **ppShaderInfo
)

Loads the shader info (*.shi) file (describes the layout and parameters of a given shader)

Parameters
filename
std::wstring&

Name of shader info file (*.shi)

ppShaderInfo
IShaderInfo**

Returns the new shader info object

const wchar_t *pFolder
)

Loads all the shaders found in the specified folder.

Parameters

path to shaders to load

DrawMesh
void CRenderer::DrawMesh(
IRenderSubMesh *pSubMesh,
IMaterialAttrib *pMaterial,
ITexture *pTexture,
IShader *pShader,
DirectX::XMMATRIX &mat
)

Draws the specified mesh.

Parameters
pMesh

Mesh to render

pMaterial
IMaterialAttrib*

Material definition for mesh (maybe nullptr)

pTexture
ITexture*

Texture to use when rendering (maybe nullptr)

pShader
IShader*

Shader to use when rendering (maybe nullptr)

mat
DirectX::XMMATRIX&

Transformation matrix to apply to mesh
